    • Method Detail

      • mouseEntered

        public void mouseEntered(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        The JList used for representing the files is created by subclasses, but the selection is monitored in this class. The TransferHandler installed in the VFSJFileChooser is also installed in the file list as it is used as the actual transfer source. The list is updated on a mouse enter to reflect the current data transfer state of the file chooser.
        Specified by:
        mouseEntered in interface java.awt.event.MouseListener
        Overrides:
        mouseEntered in class java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
